body: The school year is starting in Chile, and Enzo Abbagliati in Cadaunadas wonders, "why aren't textbooks in Chile digital?" after he spent almost $300 USD in textbooks for his son. He presents possible advantages to giving schoolchildren electronic textbooks they could read on a tablet or e-reader.
original_body: The school year is starting in Chile, and Enzo Abbagliati in Cadaunadas wonders, "why aren't textbooks in Chile digital?" after he spent almost $300 USD in textbooks for his son. He presents possible advantages to giving schoolchildren electronic textbooks they could read on a tablet or e-reader.
title: Chile: Electronic Textbooks for Schoolchildren?
